evidence.description: STREAM_INTENT.md read and analyzed - database restructuring scope defined for one-to-many relationships in dynamic form system

contract_items.content: Load project_state.json and extract key parameters

evidence.description: Project state loaded - database restructuring scope confirmed with focus on one-to-many relationships, appliances, boilers, and dynamic fields

evidence.content: Initial database complexity assessed: Current Firebase schema uses arrays for appliances in sales records, lacks proper one-to-many relationships, dynamic fields exist but relationships unclear. Complexity indicates need for systematic restructuring.

MCP workflow requirements documented: Stream path enforcement, schema analysis framework, relationship mapping requirements, performance impact assessment, security implications analysis, and validation testing procedures established.
